article_title: Has Obama Created A New Star Chamber By Rewriting The Law?

article_metadata.author: Daniel Fisher

og.description: The rise of administrative agencies with the power to make law and fine citizens outside the court system resembles nothing so much as the Star Chamber of King James I, a legal historian argues.
og.title: Has Obama Created A New Star Chamber By Rewriting The Law?
